name: Investigator
description: Investigator is a first-person exploration game with horror elements, where the events take place in a world of extreme weather cataclysms.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit, Windows 8.1 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX 4300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 460 2 Gb/Radeon 6850 2 Gb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit, Windows 8.1 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770/AMD R9 270x DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
